website_summaries.verdict: An ideal option for at-home drug testing.
pros: Provides test results in just minutes
One-step test process is fast and easy
Backed by expert customer service professionals

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, convenient, and easy to read!!
customer_reviews.text: Usually I just go to the drug store to buy a drug test, but I came across this test while shopping for some things on Amazon. Since it had some pretty good reviews and is a fraction of the cost compared to the brands at the drug store, I thought I would give it a try. The first test I took was positive. Due to the test being more sensitive compared to prior tests I've used, I figured I should wait a few extra days to take the test again. About 6 days after taking the last test, I took the test again and got a negative result.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Too Faint, It Works Though
customer_reviews.text: These work, but they're so hard to see! I would buy the THC Check ones instead. I was passing on these and I felt like I was, but they're so faint when you're passing that you psyche yourself out and think well maybe it's wrong since it feels like you're convincing yourself there is a line but you aren't too sure since it's just too faint. Seriously buy the competitors for 20NG so you don't have to stress out thinking you are just seeing things.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I tested clean on it and then passed my probation drug test.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnna Jamison

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I used the 4 level test before using this test. Once my level came down to the 50 ng/mL on the 4 level test, to save a few dollars I ordered the 20 ng/mL tests. I took 2 tests from the same urine sample and they both had 2 clear lines. FYI- the T line is lighter than the C line. If I do need to test again, I'd purchase these. They are a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Jin Thompson

customer_reviews.title: READ PRODUCT DESCRIPTION. NOT A PREGNANCY TEST.
customer_reviews.text: Used this and it came back positive. A big fight ensued. I blame myself as I did not realize it was a THC test, I thought it was a pregnancy test and my boyfriend cheated on me. Was relieved to find he wasn't pregnant with someone else's baby, just smoking the devil's lettuce. So I guess it worked really well either way.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Lavender

customer_reviews.title: The line is always too faint. Please make it darker
customer_reviews.text: Thankyou. I have bought around 40 of these to track my levels. Good news. I am below the 20ng :-) on day 138. It took a long time because I am overweight , old, smoked concentrated oils and have been on bed rest the past 11 months due to bad injuries. And two surgeries. Thank you for fast delivery and great product. Please make the faint line darker. It makes me believe it’s not good enough or it’s defective. The lab tested it and the samples were fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy boots

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Consistency
customer_reviews.text: I tested the same sample with these strips as well as the 5 panel from the same manufacturer which has sensitivity down to 15 ng/ml. These strips read positive while the 15 ng strip read negative. Do NOT recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: koalayumyum

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: I passed this at home drug test but then failed a pre-employment drug test at a lab
customer_reviews.author: Jazmyne Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Highly Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate. Trying to get a new job so i quit smoking. I was a very light smoker with long breaks in between smoking. This showed positive 2 days after smoking. It has been 14 days since I last smoked and I'm good to go now. Passed.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Weber

customer_reviews.title: Reliable product to use prior to employment drug tests
customer_reviews.text: A great purchase at an affordable price. Measures thc metabolites at 20ng/dL which is less than half of the normal cut-off level for most drug tests so it gives you a certain degree of confidence knowing you passed a more sensitive test. However, the test line is often very lightly colored making interpretation of results a bit more difficult. The company does offer the option of sending in a photo of the drug test for confirmation of the test results. Overall good buy for anyone who needs to pass a drug screen for work
customer_reviews.author: Doc P

customer_reviews.title: Works.
customer_reviews.text: Work just as advertised. You have to trust that if you can see the second line....no matter how faint.....there is nothing in the sample. Accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Mark  Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sensitivity is very good, making it lower than a normal urinalysis test ...
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price & gave me the results I needed. Sensitivity is very good, making it lower than a normal urinalysis test is very beneficial and lets you feel confident about the results either way.
customer_reviews.author: Izaac Tompkins

customer_reviews.title: The important thing for anyone who suffers from pain,CBD oils work!! I  buy it at Amazon,only!
customer_reviews.text: Where I am from, an individual that sees a “pain” Specialist you dare not breath a word to them about CBD oils and gummies ! After my first week on CBD oil , I was blown away at the relief I felt from absolute years of agonizing pain from an accident that has left me totally disabled! I have actually learned when it’s best to take the oil and truly be able to think clearly and accomplish what I have started without the horrible pain! I hope more people will try the CBD oil and even the gummie bears ,it’s a natural way to have a much better life!!
customer_reviews.author: MYSTIQUE K P

customer_reviews.title: They do not work inaccurate results do not trust!
customer_reviews.text: These test do not work at all!!! Be aware when you purchase these I have bought several of the 20/ngl and the 15/ngl after being clean for 57 days chronic user the 15/ngl said I was negative for thc. I went to a lab to do a certified rapid drug screen today and said I was positive for 50/ngl of thc so do not waste your money on these better off shelling some extra cash at a lab to do a test if you have a pre employment test or random test at your job not worth risking your career. I am very unhappy with these at home drug test none of them work!
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and Reliable Test
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best test on the market. It really gives you the reassurance you need to know you will pass a lab test. I passed this and a few days later passed my pre employment LabCorp test.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Study for your drug test
customer_reviews.text: Good to help you pass a drug test. If you need to pass one, you just need time, patience, and water. I think weed is significantly less harmful than alcohol in most people and I don’t think it should be illegal. Definitely controlled, but not illegal. Use these drug tests to find out how quickly your body processes the drug out completely so you know when to stop smoking to pass a drug test. If you're “responsible” with it, you’ll be able to stop long enough to pass and not smoke all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Titled

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with my purchase, the package it was in was very high quality. This test is very sensitive so if you past this one you’re more than likely forsure to pass your lab test. Even comes with a little panflet with FAQ on how your metabolism could help you detox in marijuana and how other things that can contribute to it, I would definitely buy again. very pleased that it come with 2 test strips
customer_reviews.author: pedro arellano

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY ACCURATE BUT SOME BATCHES ARE TOO FAINT TO READ
customer_reviews.text: I got four 2-packs of the 20ng/mL tests. 2 batches were almost impossible to read. However, they were accurate because I passed my drug test. I recommend the 5 level 15-300ng/mL test because it supposedly tests lower and the 15ng/mL is easier to read than any 20ng/mL I received. Overall, I highly recommend this product to supplement a 15-300ng/mL test. I will buy this product again before my next drug test.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Tavares

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: I have used these before and they were accurate as far as I could tell. I tedted again today to see if this bunch was accurate, and it was. so I'll continue to trust them as I detox. I'll update with weight/usage/results after formally testing at the lab.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie P.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use, love the discreet packaging they use. Love the packaging in general. Passed with flying colors at home and passed my UA for a new job. I had about 2 weeks clean. Extremely quick results less than a minute.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Broyles

customer_reviews.title: Reading is fundamental
customer_reviews.text: Have brought theses several times and they work as described. Please follow the directions. If you were a heavy smoker like I was it took me over four months to rid the thc out of my body (been smoking over 15 years the first time clean) . Also keep in mind body weight has a lot to do with you getting rid of toxins in your body. Someone the same weight as you but taller or lower body fat makes a difference in the results. CBD won’t show up only thc.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. B

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: The first test didn’t work, no lines showed up. The second test came back negative. However when my partner took his real drug test over a week later it was positive.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Bull

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and reliable
customer_reviews.text: I needed these immediately and got them the following day after ordering which was amazing. Easy to use and accurate. I love the sensitivity of these guys. Gave me huge reassurance for the actual test since I only needed to be under 50ng/ml. I would def use these again and recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: GirlonGirl

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING customer service !!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this product was the easiest at home drug test I’ve used. I wanted confirmation on my results and saw you could take and send a picture to customer service! They got back to me within a day and even went further to ask about detox’s and send me an additional test for free. Seriously the BEST customer service I have received!!! Loved the product and one of the only at home tests I’ve seen with such a low ng testing, most i’ve seen cutoff at 50ng. They have others that give you down to 15ng.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Wish the test line would come through more clear
customer_reviews.text: i was hesitant with the one level test because the test line was showing very faint at 20ng/ml, making me doubt the results and question if I was really seeing a line. All my research said a line, no matter how faint was a negative, and I ended up passing a required lab test. I ended up buying the 5 level test, down to 15ng/ml, to give me more confidence I’d pass at 20ng/ml. These tests do work, but don’t get caught up on the intensity of the test line. These tests did show a better line than another brand at the same level.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Reliable!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like that if this test is negative then I know for sure that the lab test will be negative. I also like that you can send a picture of your results to the company and they will read them for you if you're not sure of your results! Love this product and I will buy again 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: here2help

customer_reviews.title: One of two tests defective
customer_reviews.text: Got these for some peace of mind before a drug test. I put one of the tests in and it seemed to be defective. The pee never traveled up the test. I was hoping to keep the second drug test for another time, but then needed to use that. It worked great and was pretty quick. It was accurate because I passed the drug test, just not happy that half of my order didn’t work
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Unsure
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 2 pack drug test and it stated that the instructions were on the back of the package. I did not find any instructions. So, I took the test the best way I knew how. I peed on the white strip that was hanging out and my urine went inside of the capsule. The picture above shows the outcome. I'm not sure if I did it right or not. Please help!
customer_reviews.author: Avery Durgin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: worked great. i was negative for this and i passed my test
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable.  Waste money
customer_reviews.text: Passed several times over periods of several days. UDS at doctor positive w/50 ng/ml cut off.
customer_reviews.author: DoodleBugs

customer_reviews.title: Need better instructions
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 different brands to test, by far the worst set of written instructions. Only brand that didn't specifically mention not to submerge test strip past certain point. Wouldn't have figure out why tests were invalid if I hadn't bought other brands with better instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Do not trust. Better off going to CVS/Walgreens and buying one there.
customer_reviews.author: Cole Broderick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well, I got the job so you get 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: KirbyRigid

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I used a 5 level test first before using these tests. I was positive on the level tester for THC. I then used 2 of these. The first was positive and then a week later I took another and was negative. The results of each was very clear to read. All in all it has taken me about 3 weeks to get a negative result after completely stopping all THC products and using multiple tests.
customer_reviews.author: Ris26

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and Easy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: I got a two pack just before taking a drug test. Passed both the night before and then the official with flying colors! Very easy to use but can be hard to see the line that shows you're clean (that's why I love the 2 pack).
customer_reviews.author: Corey Jeffs

customer_reviews.title: Just follow the instructions
customer_reviews.text: Product came just on time! I got a negative result, that showed a strong C line and a faint but visible T line. I’ve been cleansing 26 days now. Drinking water daily multiple time a day and cranberry juice, lemon water every other day. As well as eating healthy and exercising daily. I have a very low body fat ratio and fast metabolism. This product did give me peace of mind. I’ve only tried one of the tests for now I’m going to try again at day 32 for me which will be Monday and see what happens. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jhon bernal

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and the sensitivity is below what a standard lab test is so if you pass this one, you'll be clean for the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Jones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, you can email them pictures of your test and they'll confirm the results for you.
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Accurate results for me!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to just be sure I was clean, I took two tests. I also took tests from the local dollar store - those tests said I tested positive; these tests said negative... I ended up being negative! So, I'm happy with these!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: This test said I was clean when in fact I was not. So I'm very unhappy about this.
customer_reviews.author: Erica1985

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The directions on the package were easy to read and understand. It even includes help via email if needed. It does not come with a cup to collect sample.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Tested positive. Went to lab the next day and ...
customer_reviews.text: Tested positive. Went to lab the next day and got a lab test done for 20 cutoff and 10 confirmation and passed. Do not trust
customer_reviews.author: Madison Staley

customer_reviews.title: Light recreational user
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worked for me, however, I’m a light recreational user (smoke a couple times a week) and the last time I’d smoked was about a month prior to my drug test. Passed my drug test with flying colors! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous User

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive, easy tests. And you get a coupon.
customer_reviews.text: Very good! I used both packs in the weeks before a pre-employment test. The first came back positive, which freaked me out. But then a week later, I used the second one which was negative. I passed the drug test a few days later, these are so sensitive! Also I got a coupon for 25% off my next purchase from them! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Emma MacMillan

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to do. I'm a medical marijuana patient but I was applying for a job that tests when you are first hired so I wanted to make sure I would test clean and be hired. Both tests were negative and I went in two days later for my test at a walk in clinic and results came back negative!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Stone

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Take off cap and soak tip in urine. Wait 5 minutes to get results.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria from San Jose

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: It was accurate. Although I'd rather buy the ones at the dollar store.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Burk

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: not accurate at all! even after 4 months of being clean, it still shows positive results.
customer_reviews.author: AE Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Did this one before my yearly physical, we get ...
customer_reviews.text: Did this one before my yearly physical, we get tested for 40ng/mL, after confirming with costumer service the faint line was really a negative, I passed with flying colors, will buy again specially since it's a really sensitive test, most tests are 50 ng/mL, this one's 20.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pissed
customer_reviews.text: Defective! No lines at all. I want more tests sent or a refund!
customer_reviews.author: MsTex

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend! Accurate!
customer_reviews.text: So thankful for wonderful customer service. They were able to tell me my test was negative and I passed my pre-employment drug screen! Would definitely recommend and buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Wyman

customer_reviews.title: Hard to determine if it’s reasjng positive or negative
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t tell if it was positive or negative. The line was barely faint. Should have been a negative read but it was really really faint and made us question what the results were. Kinda pointless to buy and use a test like this and not be able to tell if it’s negative or positive
customer_reviews.author: Kk

customer_reviews.title: Unlike what most reviews claim, instructions are included
customer_reviews.text: I recommend ordering the 2 pack instead of 1 just in case you don't see the instructions and mess it up. The test worked great. Zero complaints. They even included a pamplet explaining how to read the test and also included a 25% off Amazon coupon for your next purchase. Will definitely recommend to anyone who needs an affordable drug test.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Easy, accurate test
customer_reviews.text: Got here in one day. Easy to use. Easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: PatsyVeronica

customer_reviews.title: Easy & works
customer_reviews.text: Worked for me. Passed a hospital 12 panel drug screen. I’d recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: James Caserta

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and easy
customer_reviews.text: I like the lower level testing option this product gives. It worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Cho

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions exactly for both tests, and I never even got the control line. Waste of money as I didn't even a partial result for either one - just complete blanks.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont trust the result
customer_reviews.text: This is the third test I use ...the first two had faded negative lines so I went ahead and ordered 2 more and this is the result super faded I can't even tell if it's negative because you can't even see the C lines...waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Romeo

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Takes 5 minutes to detect, wasn’t very clear but even a faint line means you passed
customer_reviews.author: Sage

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It does what it stand out to do. Very easy to use. I recommended this @ 100% to anyone to use who not sure about thier drug test.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: they work
customer_reviews.text: they work pass them and you will pass your test
customer_reviews.author: Connor Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great instructions, worked great
customer_reviews.text: Worked great right at 30 days. Pre-employment screen confirmed this test result. Would buy again. Even the packaging and instructions were dope.
customer_reviews.author: D-Girl

customer_reviews.title: by far the best deal on testers on the market
customer_reviews.text: I made sure this tester actually works. Very reliable. For the cost and accuracy, by far the best deal on testers on the market. Don't even waste your time with the 50 ng testers; they are hit or miss on false negatives.
customer_reviews.author: OS

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I know it says "faint lines are negative" but it would be more reassuring if it wasn't so light in any circumstance.
customer_reviews.author: Jeeves Wellington

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works as it says. Does not give false negatives
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what you need it to do.
customer_reviews.text: The tests arrived in appropriate packaging and were not damaged in any way. The pouch contained clear instructions on how to use the test. The test did exactly what I needed it to do. The line was somewhat faint, but I was able to see that my result was negative. Since I was unsure of how sensitive the actual test would be, this provided me with a good idea I where I stood. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Nelly V

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. My husband took both tests. The first one the second line was VERY faint. The second test it was 100% clear that he was negative for thc. Well the next day, he took 2 drug tests and failed both tests right away.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Junk took two test control line never appeared followed directions Still nothing waste of money
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Great results
customer_reviews.text: The test results came in fast after following instructions. At first, I was confused on how to use the test. The tools included were helpful and made the process quicker and smoother.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Faint lines
customer_reviews.text: The lines were so faint that I honestly didn’t know if it was negative or positive. I tested one of the tests with water and even the negative line on that was super faint :| But when I used the 5 levels test from U test it was all negative
customer_reviews.author: Uyen Sigler

customer_reviews.title: No instructions
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely no instructions on how to use this test. How far do you put he test strip in the urine? How long do you leave it in? How long should you wait to read results? I will go back to my previous brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A faded line is a pass!
customer_reviews.text: Test is accurate, however the test line tends to be a bit light and can be hard to see.
customer_reviews.author: R. Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived in good condition. It was easy to use and showed the results quickly, as promised. I already have recommended it to friends and co-workers. It gave me great peace of mind knowing that I would test negative at work.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive, Reliable, Accurate
customer_reviews.text: This test is very sensitive and accurate. This is the first time I have ordered a UTest product from Amazon, but I have used their products in the past and have always found them to be very reliable. Highly recommend. Mine was delivered in two days, thanks Amazon Prime.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Foster

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I passed with this, but failed when I took the real test.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Always insures i'm clean before i go for a test.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Fallik

customer_reviews.title: Good to have on hand
customer_reviews.text: I used mine when detoxing, so I have an estimate of my levels. Works great
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described. Just follow the instructions and how ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Just follow the instructions and how to read the results that are included with the product and you"ll be able to use the test successfully. I'm 5'6, 140 lbs, used THC a few times a week and it took me 20 days to get a clean result.
customer_reviews.author: nick bunney

customer_reviews.title: Don’t work no reading.
customer_reviews.text: These do not work. No reading what so ever. Don’t waste your money. I will contact amazon for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Busted
customer_reviews.text: Very sensitive. 5 times more sensitive than most. Can read up to four months
customer_reviews.author: Burton w

customer_reviews.title: Works but line is hard to see.
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate if following directions, line is very faint so you have to look closely. Use this one day prior to taking a lab test and pasted both.
customer_reviews.author: Rod K.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I used clean urine as a control and the negative line is so faint, you can barely see it. I ended up purchasing an at home test from the drugstore which was easy to read and simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Accurate readings proved by trial
customer_reviews.text: Tests were accurate. Test before and after and they gave correct readings. The reason for only four stars is the faint red bar indicating a negative reading. That needs to be addressed.
customer_reviews.author: J Fonseca

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Worked accurately for me. Self testing to know when my system is clean.
customer_reviews.author: R.A. CRAIG

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, peace of mind.
customer_reviews.text: I passed a 3 - 50 ng tests, then took this test and failed it. I retook this test a few days later and passed. While my pre-employment test is not as this low of a level, it does make me feel better knowing I could pass this one.
customer_reviews.author: Chels

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Accurate and easy to use. Doesn't come with a cup though.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Consistent
customer_reviews.text: The dim neg line can cause some anxiety....but as explained...negative is negative
customer_reviews.author: jeffro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to use, and cheaper than in the drug-stores
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly S Jagger

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and simple
customer_reviews.text: Simple, easy instructions. The package comes with two individually wrapped tests. Test results are very clear.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest test I have ever taken. It is very easy to read and is super accurate. I would definitely recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hamel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used these a few times now and they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Number 1

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product compared to 50ng even though 50ng is th cut off , little pricey I would say however worth the money. Good for knowing your window for very infrequent users
customer_reviews.author: Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Hands-Down the best!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best brand and company hands down on the market... The quality is better than that of products that are double the price...
customer_reviews.author: Allan keim

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to read and works in 30 seconds. Accurate as well I passed my official drug test two days later
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Bullard

customer_reviews.title: Testing
customer_reviews.text: The product was used before a test to insure I was negitive
customer_reviews.author: Brian Dully

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It worked well. Just need to supply your own cup to collect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, as I found out the hard way
customer_reviews.author: Mikey Watters

customer_reviews.title: Works fine. Told me I was clean before my test ...
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. Told me I was clean before my test where I showed up as clean. Only gripe is that it could be *a little* more clear with the second stripe showing "clean"
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Orbank II

customer_reviews.title: Both tests invalid and did not work
customer_reviews.text: Both tests in each package were shown invalid and no lines were shown.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very faint, but works
customer_reviews.text: It works, but the line is very very very faint. You second guess yourself if it’s actually there.
customer_reviews.author: lesha

product_meta.title: ÜTest Highly Sensitive Instant THC 20 ng/mL Marijuana Single Panel Home Drug Test (2 pack)LOW Detection Level - Customer Service Included
product_meta.description:
The UTest Difference - High Quality - Fast Results 

UTest THC testing kits offer peace of mind and a judgement free testing option that you can use in the comfort of your own home. Made in the USA, these 99% accurate test kits will give you results you can trust. The UTest test strips are very sensitive and offer instant results.The judgement free policy extends to UTest’s customer service representatives who are there to ensure you understand your results and to answer your questions.
feature_bullets: UTEST EXCLUSIVE THC TEST KIT - These made in America THC urine tests are both discreet and reliable making an at home drug test quick and easy.
INSTANT RESULTS - Our test strips will give you accurate results within minutes in the privacy of your own home.

HIGHLY SENSITIVE DRUG TESTS - At 20 ng/mL, our marijuana test strips detect below the 50 ng/mL THC test industry standard, making our drug tests the most sensitive and instantaneous tests on the market.

TAKE-HOME DRUG TEST - UTest THC kits are a one step, easy-to-use, self-testing device with clear instructions to help you read and interpret your results. INSTRUCTIONS are located on the label of the pouch by peeling back the left hand corner (Peel Me For Instructions).
CUSTOMER SERVICE PROVIDED - Unsure about your test strip’s results? Need help with use? Contact our no-judge, customer service that is offered with every test we sell.
